general.lockedToolTip: Themes installed via plugin are locked and can not be deleted
general.messageSaveError: Theme could not be assigned to Sales Channel.

themeListItem.notificationDeleteErrorMessage: The theme you want to delete is still allocated to at least one Sales Channel.

modal.textDeleteInfo: Are you sure you really want to delete the theme "{themeName}"?
modal.textDuplicateInfo: If you create a duplicate, you can use the theme with a different colour configuration for additional Sales Channels.
modal.textRenameInfo: Enter a new name for the theme.
modal.modalTextResetInfo: Are you sure you want to reset the theme to the default settings?
modal.modalTextResetAssigned: This will change the appearance of your shop.
modal.textSaveInfo: Do you really want to save the changes? This will change the appearance of your shops.

salesChannelAlreadyAssignedModal.descriptionSingle: This Sales Channel is already assigned to a theme. If you go on and save, the theme assignment will be replaced with {newThemeName}:
salesChannelAlreadyAssignedModal.descriptionMultiple: Some of your chosen Sales Channels are already assigned to a theme. If you go on and save, the following theme assignments will be replaced with {newThemeName}:

salesChannelRemovedModal.descriptionSingle: You have removed a theme assignment. If you go on and save, the theme assignment will be replaced with {defaultThemeName}:
salesChannelRemovedModal.descriptionMultiple: You have removed some of your theme assignments. If you go on and save, the following theme assignments will be replaced with {defaultThemeName}:

actions.saveCleanToolTip: The current values will be rewritten completely. Use this to make a clean entry after fields were deleted or changed its types.
actions.deleteDisabledToolTip: Theme is still assigned to a Sales Channel.

detail.salesChannel: Assigned to the following Sales Channels
detail.inheritanceInfo: This theme is derived from the "{parentThemeName}" theme.
detail.salesChannelHelpText: It is not possible to remove these assignments here. If you want to change a Sales Channel's theme, visit the respective Sales Channel's settings.

themeCompile.title: Error compiling theme
themeCompile.message: The theme could not be compiled. Please check the full error message to resolve this issue.
